text.div: No narrative is provided for definitional resources. A human-readable rendering can be found in the implementation guide(s) where this resource is used.

description.value: This extension provides a generic method to extend profiles with a reference to zib-Stoma. Often it is not possible to reference a Condition resource, on which zib-Stoma is mapped, in an element whose definition matches that of zib-Stoma.
